document_data.name: Yvonne Chantel
document_data.mainbody: '''Yvonne Chantel''' was a [[paladin]] of [[Tyr]] the Evenhanded from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]], active in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Yvonne Chantel's appearance was described as lovely.
document_data.History: Little was recorded of Yvonne Chantel's life and pious deeds; however, the paladin's name graced the pages of the ''[[Ravens Bluff Trumpeter]]'' [[broadsheet]] of Ravens Bluff on at least one occasion. [[Jacinth Moonspring|Jacinth "Jackie" Moonspring]], the Society Editor, connected handsome warrior of Tyr, Yvonne Chantel, to a notorious womanizer knight named [[Don Juan Montery]]. The column named several other women with whom the "Chicken Knight" became entangled in a single month: the [[half-elven]] scout named [[Opal Starlight]], [[Vedina Stareye]], and the fellow [[Knight of the Golden Rooster]] named [[Ladyhawke]].
